item.description:
Booty.  Vortex.

Not words one would normally put together ... unless you've been to a Booty Vortex show.  Then you really can't think of one without the other.

So let's meetup at Johnny D's in Somerville and dance ourselves down to sweaty little nubs while Booty Vortex brings the funk and disco.

Booty Vortex is a 13 piece band that will definitely get you to "shake what yo mama gave ya".  (For more info on the band, see their website: Booty Vortex)

We've always had a fantastic time at Booty shows.  Please join us and you'll have a fantastic time, too.

 

The details:

  • The cover charge for this show is $12 cash at the door.
  • The music starts at around 10:00.

    I'll be hanging to the left of the entrance starting at 9:00 p.m. and I'll be there until the music starts.  As you pay your cover charge, look immediately to the left and over the room divider/window behind the door guys -- that's where I'll be.

  • If you come to the show, please text or call me to find me, preferably text.

    I look like my profile picture, although I have a shaved head ... and I won't be wearing a knit cap on Satuday.  Once the music starts, I do wander around and look for folks (so it really helps if you posted a good picture of yourself), but texting me is the way to find me once the show starts.

    (I'll also email my cell # to all Yes RSVPers on the afternoon of the show.)


  • If you're driving to the show, note that there are street parking spots, but they may be difficult to find.

    Johnny D's has a good city parking map here.

  • If you're taking the T, the Davis Square Red Line stop is directly across the street from Johnny D's.
  • Here's a link to Johnny D's website.
  • This is a joint meeting with the Cambridge-Somerville Live Music group.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my profile picture. I'll be hanging to the immediate left of the entrance and I'll also email my cell # to all Yes RSVPers on the afternoon of the show.
item.name: Booty Vortex @ Johnny D's
